content: Run `echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Legacy Code Cleanup\007"` to set terminal title
META: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Analyze current usage of functions in transformations.rs to identify which are still being called
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after usage analysis
Create utilities module for shared parameter location logic
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating utilities
Extract duplicated parameter location logic from tier_execution.rs and result_building.rs to utilities
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after extracting parameter logic
Remove unused functions from transformations.rs that were replaced by transformer system
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing dead functions
Fix any remaining build warnings including unused imports and variables
Build and verify no warnings remain
Run `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
Fix any clippy issues (remove dead code, don't use _ prefixes)
Run `cargo +nightly fmt`
Run `cargo nextest run`
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP work and prepare for code review phase
Task new subagent to review changes focusing on duplication and complexity (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with user
